thread.title_full: The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus Presents a Night to Remember Beneath the StarsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus Presents a Night to Remember Beneath the StarsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul presents a Night to Remember Beneath the Stars
The Spa of Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus introduces Bosphorus Night Spa for guests who would like to enjoy al fresco relaxation on the beautiful terrace overlooking the Bosphorus.
The Spa team has created a memorable Istanbul experience by moving the massage service outdoors during summer. Guests can choose 60 or 90 minute Swedish or Deep Tissue massage between 8:15 and 11:00 pm every day with 24 hours notice.
The Bosphorus Night Spa experience aims to blend modern spa therapies with the charm of the destination. As an urban resort with extensive Spa facilities and an unbeatable location on the water, the Hotel now offers the magic and mysticism of Istanbul wrapped in the picturesque environment of the Bosphorus.
